question: 文法
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>method</kanji> of <kanji>writing</kanji> is how you write. You can have vocabulary words, but you have to be able to put them together using some kind of method. This method happens to be <vocabulary>grammar</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The <ja>ほう</ja> changes to <ja>ぽう</ja>.
